title: Microsoft Office 2013 VL ProPlus Multi-26 (x64) August 2016
description:
Microsoft Office 2013 VL ProPlus Multi-26 (x64) August 2016

*** Release Info
- OS: 64-bit version of Windows 10/8.1/8,7 SP1 + Server/Server 2012 R2/2012/Server 2008 R2
- Main language: English (iso file)
- Additional languages (rar files): Arabic, Brazilian, Bulgarian, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Italian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Serbian (Latin), Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish 
- Channel: Volume License
- Version 15.0.4833.1000 (SP1)
- Architectures: x64
- Updated August 9, 2016

*** How to

** If you need English version only
Download Office_ProPlus_2013w_SP1_64Bit_English_2016.08.iso from Base folder

** If you want to create an ISO file in another language
1. Download full Base folder
2. From folder 'Languages', download the RAR file(s) of your choice
3. Extract your RAR file to Base folder, it will place a (relatively) small ISO file and a batch file with the same name
4. Open the batch file and run it (no need to run as administrator), wait until it finishes and closes
5. At the end of the process, the modified (updated) ISO file in the chosen language resides in Base folder

*** Bonus folder

- KMSpico 10.2.0 + Microsoft Toolkit 2.6 Final (activators)
- Classic Menu for Office v5.85 (adds Office 2003 type toolbars and menus to Office 2013)
- Office Tab v9.81 (edit multiple files within a single tabbed window)
- Previous versions uninstallers (Office 2003, 2007, 2010)
- Disable/Restore 'Sign In' option in Office applications (reg file)
- Disable/Restore Office 2013 Telemetry (reg file)
- ShellNewHandler (easily remove New Microsoft_xxxx in Windows Explorer context menu)

*** Installation

- Delete any previously installed version using the provided uninstallers (bonus folder) and reboot if required
- Mount / burn / extract ISO file
- Install Office 2013
- Activate using KMSpico (recommended) / Microsoft Toolkit (re-run activator if you add an application later)
- Install Visual Studio for Office Runtime (bonus folder)

** Optional

- Classic Menu for Office v5.85 + serial
- Office Tab v9.81 + serial
- Disable / Restore Office Telemetry - merge reg file 'Disable/Restore Office 2013 Telemetry' (takes effect after rebooting your machine)
- Disable / Restore 'Sign In' option in Office applications - merge reg file 'Disable / Restore Sign In' (takes effect after rebooting your machine)
- Run ShellNewHandler (easily remove New Microsoft_xxxx in Windows Explorer context menu - optional)
